features.featureTitle: Apply a cohesive visual theme throughout the entire website: earthy Punjabi tones (rustic brown #6B3A2A, mustard yellow #E8A020, warm red #C0392B, off-white #FAF7F2), Poppins or Inter as the primary sans-serif font, generous whitespace, and strong high-contrast CTA buttons. The overall feel should be modern-premium with an authentic Punjabi dhaba character.

Build a persistent site-wide header containing: the restaurant name 'Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi' in English and 'पिंड पहाड़ी रेस्टोरेंट दिल्ली' in Hindi (smaller subtitle), a visible phone number (click-to-call link), and navigation links to Home, Menu, About Us, Reviews, and Contact/Book Table. On mobile the nav collapses into a hamburger menu.

Create the Home page Hero section with: the generated hero background image (hero-bg.dim_1400x800.png) as a full-width background, the bilingual restaurant name overlaid in large text, the tagline 'Authentic Taste of Pahadi & Punjabi Flavours in Najafgarh', and three prominent CTA buttons: 'Call Now' (tel: link), 'Book a Table' (scrolls to booking form or routes to Contact page), and 'View Menu' (routes to Menu page).

Add a 'Why Choose Us' section on the Home page displaying five icon+copy cards: '4.8 Rated by Customers', 'Authentic Pahadi & Punjabi Dishes', 'Professional & Polite Staff', 'Near Metro Gate No. 2', and 'Dine-in, Pickup & Delivery Available'. Use relevant emoji or inline SVG icons for each card.

Add a 'Featured Dishes' section on the Home page displaying five dish cards using the generated dish images: Veg Momos (veg-momos.dim_400x300.png), Veg Burger (veg-burger.dim_400x300.png), Coffee (coffee.dim_400x300.png), Punjabi Thali (punjabi-thali.dim_400x300.png), and Restaurant Ambience (ambience.dim_400x300.png). Each card shows the dish image, name, and a short one-line description. Include a 'View Full Menu' CTA button below the grid.

Add a 'Reviews' section on the Home page showing three real testimonial cards: 'Authentic food and variety of dishes.', 'Professional staff and overall great food.', and 'Friendly and warm ambience.' Display a 4.8-star rating badge and '51 Reviews' count. Include a 'Book Your Visit Today' CTA button that routes to the Contact/Book Table page.

Add a 'Location' section on the Home page displaying: an embedded Google Maps iframe centered on 'Gate No 2, Metro Station, Nangli, Najafgarh, New Delhi, Delhi 110043', the full address text, opening hours 'Open — Closes 10 PM', price range '₹400–600 per person', a 'Get Directions' button linking to Google Maps directions URL for the address, and a 'Call Now' tel: link button.

Build the Menu page with a categorized layout. Hard-code a representative set of menu items across four categories: Starters, Main Course, Beverages, and Combos. Each item shows: item name, short description, price (in ₹), and an 'Order Now' button. The page should have a category filter/tab bar at the top to switch between categories.

Build the About Us page with a section describing the restaurant's story, values (authentic Pahadi & Punjabi cuisine, family-friendly, near Najafgarh Metro Gate No. 2), and a brief team/staff highlight. Include a CTA linking to the Contact/Book Table page.

Build the Reviews page displaying all three real testimonials in card format (same as the homepage Reviews section), along with the 4.8-star rating, 51 reviews count, and a prominent 'Book Your Visit Today' CTA.

Build the Contact / Book Table page containing: a table booking form with fields for Name, Phone Number, Number of Guests, Date, Time, and Special Request; a 'Reserve My Table' submit button; and an inline confirmation message 'Thank you! Our team will call you shortly to confirm your booking.' shown on successful submission. Also include the address, phone number (tel: link), and a Google Maps iframe on this page.

Add a mobile sticky bottom bar (fixed to the bottom of the viewport on screens ≤768px) with three action buttons: 'Call' (tel: link), 'Directions' (Google Maps link), and 'Book Table' (routes to Contact/Book Table page). This bar must be present on all pages.

Add a WhatsApp floating chat button visible on all pages (bottom-right corner on desktop, above the sticky bar on mobile). The button should open a WhatsApp chat link (https://wa.me/ with the restaurant's placeholder number) in a new tab.

Add SEO meta tags to the app's HTML head: title 'Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi | Authentic Pahadi & Punjabi Food in Najafgarh', meta description referencing best restaurant in Najafgarh, Pahadi & Punjabi cuisine, near metro, ₹400–600. Add JSON-LD LocalBusiness schema markup with the restaurant name, address (Gate No 2, Metro Station, Nangli, Najafgarh, New Delhi, Delhi 110043), price range, and rating (4.8, 51 reviews).
